---
title: "Purchase"
description: "Purchase accounts via the API."
---

## Endpoint

```
GET https://api.nicealts.com/v1/generate
```

## **Parameters**

<ParamField query="key" type="parameter" required>
  Put your API Key here.
</ParamField>

<ParamField query="type" path="quantity" type="parameter" required>
  What type of AccessToken you would like to buy.

  - `unbanned`
  - `unbanned_hq`
  - `banned`
  - `banned_hq`
</ParamField>

<ParamField query="amount" path="payment_method" type="parameter" required>
  The amount of accounts you would like to purchase. Put your API Key here.
</ParamField>

<ParamField query="precheck" path="quantity" type="parameter" required="false">
  If you would like to precheck your accounts.

  - `none` No prechecking.
  - `full` Prechecking.
</ParamField>

## Request Example

<CodeGroup>

```bash cURL
curl "https://api.nicealts.com/v1/generate?key=YOUR_API_KEY&type=banned&amount=1&precheck=full"
```

</CodeGroup>

## Response Example

Accounts will be delivered in one of the formats below.


## Error Responses

<ResponseField name="400 Bad Request" type="error">
  Invalid request parameters.

  ```json
  {"detail": "Type must be 'banned' or 'unbanned'"}
  ```

  ```json
  {"detail": "Precheck must be 'none' or 'full'"}
  ```
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="401 Unauthorized" type="error">
  Invalid or missing API key.

  ```json
  {"detail": "Missing API key"}
  ```

  ```json
  {"detail": "Invalid API key"}
  ```
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="402 Insufficient credits" type="error">
  Insufficient credits.

  ```json
  {"detail": "Insufficient credits"}
  ```
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="409 Conflict" type="error">
  Insufficient stock.

  ```json
  {"detail":"Insufficient stock"}
  ```
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="429 Too Many Requests" type="error">
  Rate limit exceeded. You can send upto 100 requests per minute.

  ```json
  {"error": "Rate limit exceeded", "message": "Too many requests. Please try again later."}
  ```
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="503 Service Unavailable" type="error">
  Backend service unavailable.

  ```json
  {"error": "Backend service unavailable", "message": "The API server is currently unavailable. Please try again later."}
  ```
</ResponseField>
